page.title: 03 MR BUCKNELL
page.content: Mr. Bucknell came to be a farmer because his family are farmers. He was born in Witham at Warren Farm. Mr. Bucknell says that he could make more money doing another job,but he enjoys his life style. His neighbors are kind so that makes it a better living. He has be very careful to weigh up the cost of new machinery. He dosen't like it when there is bad weather because he loses a lot of crops and, therefore, money. He usually works from eight until five but at Harvest time he may work over night until about 1.00 in the morning. He said that farming was very hard work. In his spare time he likes to shoot game in his own wood. He also enjoys photography and does lots of it. He lives with his wife and small son.
